item.description:
This is supposed to a be a great course. A bit of a hike -mapquest says just under 2 hours. Some of us are going to carpool from the Boston Area. When you RSVP - let us know if you are interested in carpooling.

$51 for 18 + $16 for a cart. One foresomes are reserved for 10:00.
Hope you can join.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the Pro-shop by 9:45

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Day Trip to NH to Golf
